text: Kuma Shi ne wanda Yake aika iskoki, suna bishara gaba ga rahamarSa, har idan sun É—auki gizagizai masu nauyi,* sai Mu kora su ga wani gari matacce, sa'an nan Mu saukar da ruwa gare shi, sa'an nan Mu fitar, game da shi, daga dukkan 'ya'yan itice. Kamar wancan ne Muke fitar da matattu; tsammaninku, kuna tunani
